channel.title: The Cloudflare Blog
channel.description: Get the latest news on how products at Cloudflare are built, technologies used, and join the teams helping to build a better Internet.

item.title: 【Payload on Workers: a full-fledged CMS, running entirely on Cloudflare’s stack】Workers 上的有效负载：成熟的 CMS，完全在 Cloudflare 堆栈上运行
item.description: 【 We demonstrate how the open-source Payload CMS was ported to run entirely on Cloudflare's developer platform. 】我们演示了如何将开源 Payload CMS 移植到完全在 Cloudflare 的开发者平台上运行。

item.title: 【Nationwide Internet shutdown in Afghanistan extends localized disruptions】阿富汗的全国性互联网关闭扩展了本地破坏
item.description: 【 On September 29, 2025, Internet connectivity was completely shut down across Afghanistan, impacting business, education, finance, and government services. 】2025年9月29日，互联网连通性在阿富汗完全关闭，影响了商业，教育，金融和政府服务。

item.title: 【15 years of helping build a better Internet: a look back at Birthday Week 2025】15年帮助建立更好的互联网：回顾2025年生日周
item.description: 【 Rust-powered core systems, post-quantum upgrades, developer access for students, PlanetScale integration, open-source partnerships, and our biggest internship program ever — 1,111 interns in 2026. 】由生锈的核心系统，Quantum后升级，学生的开发人员访问，Planetscale集成，开源合作伙伴关系以及我们有史以来最大的实习计划 - 2026年1111名实习生。

item.title: 【Monitoring AS-SETs and why they matter】监视ASTES以及它们重要的原因
item.description: 【 We will cover some of the reasons why operators need to monitor the AS-SET memberships for their ASN, and now Cloudflare Radar can help. 】我们将介绍运营商需要监视其ASN的ASET成员资格的一些原因，而现在CloudFlare Radar可以提供帮助。

item.title: 【An AI Index for all our customers】我们所有客户的AI指数
item.description: 【 Cloudflare will soon automatically create an AI-optimized search index for your domain, and expose a set of ready-to-use standard APIs and tools including an MCP server, LLMs.txt, and a search API. 】CloudFlare将很快为您的域名创建AI优化的搜索索引，并揭示一组现成的标准API和包括MCP Server，LLMS.TXT和搜索API在内的现成标准API和工具。

item.title: 【Cloudflare just got faster and more secure, powered by Rust】Cloudflare刚刚变得更快，更安全，由Rust提供动力
item.description: 【 We’ve replaced the original core system in Cloudflare with a new modular Rust-based proxy, replacing NGINX. 】我们用基于 Rust 的新模块化代理取代了 Cloudflare 中的原始核心系统，取代了 NGINX。

item.title: 【Introducing Observatory and Smart Shield — see how the world sees your website, and make it faster in one click】介绍天文台和智能盾牌 - 查看世界如何看待您的网站，并在一次点击中更快地使其更快
item.description: 【 We're announcing two enhancements to our Application Performance suite that'll show how the world sees your website, and make it faster with one click - available Cloudflare Dashboard! 】我们宣布对我们的应用程序性能套件进行两项增强，将向全世界展示您的网站，并一键使其速度更快 - 可用的 Cloudflare 仪表板！

item.title: 【Introducing new regional Internet traffic and Certificate Transparency insights on Cloudflare Radar】在Cloudflare Radar上引入新的区域互联网流量和证书透明度见解
item.description: 【 Cloudflare Radar now offers a Certificate Transparency dashboard for monitoring TLS certificate activity, and new regional traffic insights for a sub-national perspective on Internet trends. 】CloudFlare Radar现在提供了一个证书透明度仪表板，用于监视TLS证书活动，以及新的区域交通见解，以对Internet趋势的次国家视角。

item.title: 【Eliminating Cold Starts 2: shard and conquer】消除寒冷开始2：碎片和征服
item.description: 【 We reduced Cloudflare Workers cold starts by 10x by optimistically routing to servers with already-loaded Workers. Learn how we did it here. 】我们将Cloudflare工人的冷速度降低了10倍，通过与已经负载工人的服务器进行乐观的路由。了解我们在这里做的。

item.title: 【Code Mode: the better way to use MCP】代码模式：使用MCP的更好方法
item.description: 【 It turns out we've all been using MCP wrong. Most agents today use MCP by exposing the "tools" directly to the LLM. 】事实证明，我们都在使用MCP错误。如今，大多数代理商通过将“工具”直接暴露于LLM来使用MCP。
